en.title: Dr Masaru Emoto's FE Seminar in Jakarta, 14th December 2008!
en.content:
Dr Masaru Emoto's "Scalar Energy Live Water Seminar" organized by FE at Balai Kartini. Jakarta Expo Center on 14th December 2008 was a GREAT SUCCESS with around 800 attendees! There were FE leaders attending from Malaysia and from Indonesian cities such as Medan, Pekan Baru, Jogjakarta, Bandung, Surabaya, etc. With the invaluable knowledge they gained, they will be able to further spread the good news about FE's Quantum Pendant to all corners of Indonesia!

FE's Founder CEO, Paul Ting attended the seminar with Founder Director KS Lee who gave an inspiring talk on how to build FE's global network using the 3 Ps (Product, People and Plan). Dr Amir Farid, FE's Medical Consultant presented on "Water For Life" and "Why Do We Need Scalar Energized Water?", a most interesting and educational topic for all.

A BIG thank you to FE's Indonesian Country Licensee, Patrick Widjaja and his team Irene Mongkar, Joe Prabah and Anowar JM (who did a great job MCing!) for successfully organizing the seminar! See you at the TOP!
